stable.body:
## Notes
- Accessing storage using [Shizuku](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=moe.shizuku.privileged.api) is now supported and can be enabled from **Settings > Storage**
  - This is a new solution for users which are unable to grant LAC Tool access to the LAC folders

## Features
- Shizuku support [#76](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/76) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/020086d7e0bcd6c34bc6e1e49e534ace0abff79f))
- **settings**: move to top bar & add categories [#73](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/73) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/c267be2333c312b1f0bccb6513389f5550177776))
- **l10n**: add Persian, update Turkish translations [#79](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/79) ([crowdin-bot](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/a704246440a1a560aacdf016856ed43338c8bbc5))

## Bug Fixes
- show progress dialog when sharing files [#75](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/75) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/1f32f5e9dcf8bd1dfb611b0bec1d9a434890e62c))

## Chores
- update dependencies [#75](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/75) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/796f4f243ee84b332a764b9ab4d320020d02746f))
- update app version to v3.2.0 (32000) [#75](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/75) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/989bb6702e1ef5d9dbb1df41dfaad0abae072e17))

preRelease.body:
## Notes
- Accessing storage using [Shizuku](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=moe.shizuku.privileged.api) is now supported and can be enabled from **Settings > Storage**
  - This is a new solution for users which are unable to grant LAC Tool access to the LAC folders

## Features
- Shizuku support [#76](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/76) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/020086d7e0bcd6c34bc6e1e49e534ace0abff79f))
- **settings**: move to top bar & add categories [#73](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/73) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/c267be2333c312b1f0bccb6513389f5550177776))
- **l10n**: add Persian, update Turkish translations [#79](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/79) ([crowdin-bot](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/a704246440a1a560aacdf016856ed43338c8bbc5))

## Bug Fixes
- show progress dialog when sharing files [#75](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/75) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/1f32f5e9dcf8bd1dfb611b0bec1d9a434890e62c))

## Chores
- update dependencies [#75](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/75) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/796f4f243ee84b332a764b9ab4d320020d02746f))
- update app version to v3.2.0 (32000) [#75](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/pull/75) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/commit/989bb6702e1ef5d9dbb1df41dfaad0abae072e17))
